channel.title: 2007-scape RSPS are back!
channel.description:
2007-scape is back!
Website: [url=http://2007-scape.com]2007-scape.com[/url] Serverstatus: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=server.2007-scape.com]https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=server.2007-scape.com[/url]
Features; Many donator features All Dupes FIXED ~ All Exploits FIXED ~ Client UID Added ~ Webclient + Download Client ~ 2 Registred Domains ~ Duel Arena Staking 100% NO DUPES ~ Player Following Clipped! ~ Active Pking / Staking ~ Dice Game 100% ~ 50-120 Players Online 24/7 ~ NO LAG! ~ Barrows FIXED ~ Great Economy! PK Clanwars ( adding soon ) Slayer working 100% Construction 100% woodcutting 100% Every skill is working 100% VPS 24/7 Donatorpoints shop PK/PVP/PVM bosses working
[img]http://2.hidemyass.com/ip-3/encoded/Oi8vaW1nMTAwLmltYWdlc2hhY2sudXMvaW1nMTAwLzE4MjEvMjAwN3NjYXBlc2NyZWVuLnBuZw%3D%3D[/img]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/Ofw4yUY.png]http://i.imgur.com/Ofw4yUY.png[/url]

item.title: 2007-scape RSPS are back!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Radiance:

I wish the best for you with this server. Be really persistent with advertising, and strive to get the community very nice. Since Runescape released oldschool it will be a tad bit hard.

Well, actually, we need to get all of the game files & etc from jagex…and store them offline, because you never know when it might go down…so a 2007-remake makes sense in that aspect. Although since everything is readily available from jagex, you wouldn’t have to remake as much as say for 2004-2006, which there isn’t a live copy to get anything from. Being able to have an archive of all the revisions of runescape & the websites 1999 to 2006+ for the public would be nice to see I’d say anyhows.

Read full topic
